Package net.sourceforge.metrics.propagators

These are "automatic" calculators.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AvgAvg Propagate an average value
AvgValue Calculate an average value
MaxMax Propagate a maximum value
MaxValue Calculate a maximum value
Propagator A Propagator propagates values up the source tree.
Sum Calculates the sum of the metric with name x in the source's children.
 

Package net.sourceforge.metrics.propagators Description

These are "automatic" calculators. They propagate sums, averages and maxima up the containment hierarchy
